body.bibl: Michelson, David Allen. “‘Though He Cannot Be Eaten, We Consume Him’: Appeals to Liturgical Practice in the Christological Polemic of Philoxenos of Mabbug.” In Malphono W-Rabo d-Malphone: Studies in Honor of Sebastian P.
